snippet: Nicki Minaj embraced Drake, and 50 Cent shared the stage with Nas on Sunday at the Hot 97 Summer Jam.
abstract: Jon Caramanica reviews performances at Hot 97 Summer Jam festival, featuring Nicki Minaj, Drake, Nas and 50 Cent among others, at MetLife Stadium.
lead_paragraph: Nicki Minaj embraced Drake, and 50 Cent shared the stage with Nas on Sunday at the Hot 97 Summer Jam.

headline.seo: Reuniting the Old Guard for Hot 97 Summer Jam
headline.main: Burying the Hatchet in a Bid for Relevance
headline.print_headline: Burying the Hatchet in a Bid for Relevance
